mapper.select: select sn, nm, val from frs_threshold

select sn , nm , val , type , (select cd_nm from cmn_cd where upper_cd = '00002' and esntl_cd = type) type_nm , type_2 , regist_id , date_format(regist_dt, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as regist_dt , updt_id , date_format(updt_dt, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as updt_dt from frs_threshold limit #{srchCnt} offset #{offset}

select sn , nm , val , type , (select cd_nm from cmn_cd where upper_cd = '00002' and esntl_cd = type) type_nm , type_2 , regist_id , date_format(regist_dt, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as regist_dt , updt_id , date_format(updt_dt, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as updt_dt from frs_threshold where sn = #{sn}
mapper.insert: insert into frs_threshold (nm, val, type, type_2, regist_id, regist_dt) values (#{nm}, #{val}, #{type}, #{type_2}, #{regist_id}, now(3))
insert into frs_threshold_log (threshold_sn, val, regist_id, regist_dt) select sn, val, #{updt_id}, now(3) from frs_threshold where sn = #{sn}
mapper.select:
select count(1) from frs_threshold_log where regist_dt >= str_to_date(#{srchDtFr}, '%Y-%m-%d') and regist_dt <= str_to_date(concat(#{srchDtTo}, ' 23:59:59'), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and threshold_sn = #{srchCd}
